item.title: Blog Post #1
item.description: #dog breeds average height (in) and weight (lbs) #python code dog_height ={ 'dachshund': 8, 'great dane': 32, 'boxer': 23, 'corgi': 11, } dog_height ## {'corgi': 11, 'boxer': 23, 'dachshund': 8, 'great dane': 32} dog_weight = { 'dachshund': 20, 'great dane': 120, 'boxer': 60, 'corgi': 27, } dog_weight ## {'corgi': 27, 'boxer': 60, 'dachshund': 20, 'great dane': 120} #R code library(reticulate) py$dog_height['dachshund'] ## $dachshund ## [1] 8 py$dog_height$dachshund ## [1] 8 py$dog_height ## $corgi ## [1] 11 ## ## $boxer ## [1] 23 ## ## $dachshund ## [1] 8 ## ## $`great dane` ## [1] 32
